are urging Mike Pence to run. But, he noted, that doesn't mean he has a good chance of winning. "Republicans and Democrats go through this all the time," Smith said. Particularly party activists don't see a candidate who is either well enough known, or ideologically or intellectually consistent enough for them, so they try to recruit people who fit the bill.
